basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Senior Full Stack Developer | TypeScript • React • Node.js • PostgreSQL
basics.summary: Full-Stack Engineer with robust experience in TypeScript, React, and Node.js, specializing in building scalable web applications with strong emphasis on performance and security. Proven track record of delivering high-performance solutions across frontend and backend technologies.

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Led frontend and backend initiatives in a multi-service development environment
highlights: Led frontend refactoring using Vue 3, TypeScript, and Vuetify, improving page load times by 25%
Engineered full-stack ML-integrated solutions with end-to-end development from Python training to TypeScript deployment
Developed microservice architectures with focus on performance and scalability
Implemented secure, efficient backend services using Node.js and Express

work.name: BigFoot Company
work.summary: Developed complex web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks
highlights: Built responsive web applications using Nuxt.js, Vue 3, and TypeScript
Implemented multi-step workflows with state management using Pinia
Collaborated closely with backend teams to ensure seamless API integrations

work.name: Trood
work.summary: Contributed to microservices architecture and backend development
highlights: Developed Go backend components with gRPC endpoints
Implemented data models and service communication protocols
Assisted in Next.js authentication flow development

projects.name: AdCognition
projects.description: End-to-End ML Ad Detection System with Chrome Extension
